note:
I apologize ahead of time for getting any pronouns wrong. If I do, I promise it's not on purpose, I'm just old and slow.

I know I'm supposed to be civil, but I make no promises if I interact with any fascists, white supremacists, or other far-right savages. Expect me to say a lot about politics.

I'm anticapitalist, but not crazy about Marx's solution.

I'm Japanese, Norwegian, and Swedish. I like cooking and nerd stuff.

Money speaks for money, the devil for his own
Who comes to speak for the skin and the bone?

The law locks up the man or woman
Who steals the goose off the common
But leaves the greater villain loose
Who steals the common from the goose.

Mention @mastoreaderio(@mastodon.social) in a thread and write "unroll". I'll reply with a link.

Use visbility "Mentioned people only" to not spam other people's timelines and threads unless you want others to see the unrolled thread as well.

Direct feedback at @badlogic.

Source: https://github.com/badlogic/ledit/blob/main/site/mastoreaderbot.mjs

Everything runs in your browser! No data is collected! I honor #nobot

We keep chickens too and even though we have been doing this for a number of years we learn something new every week. It can be hard and exhausting but at the same time it can be rewarding and fascinating. We love it…

Project Gutenberg, founded in 1971, is the oldest producer and distributor of free ebooks.

According to Michael Hart (March 8, 1947 – September 6, 2011), founder of Project Gutenberg, the mission of Project Gutenberg is simple: to encourage the creation and distribution of eBooks.
This mission is, as much as possible, to encourage all those who are interested in making eBooks and helping to give them away.
